articles.title: Pump prices up in Singapore, with premium grade breaching S$4 a litre - CNA
articles.description:
SINGAPORE: Pump prices in Singapore surged on Friday (Jun 3), fuelled by the uptrend in global crude oil prices this week on the back of a phased ban of Russian oil imports by the European Union and worries about global supply.

According to fuel price comp…

articles.title: Second Monkeypox case confirmed in Victoria - ABC News
articles.description: Victoria records its second case of Monkeypox in a returned overseas traveller who visited Europe.
articles.content:
Victoria has recorded its second case of Monkeypox in a returned overseas traveller who had visited Europe.
